Nerangs.ab: drōn ud gōšudāg ud ēsm ud bōy 3 tāg ānōh nihādan ud frasast aziš kār-ē nēst srōšdrōn pad bun pad ʾsšn' har čiš bē nigerišn tā srōšdrōn xwardan ā-š wars ud abzār az barsom ō pahrezišn hōm kamistīh 3 tāk urwarām pārag-ē nihādan

"He should put there in place the drōn and the gōšudāg and three pieces of ēsm and bōy. There is no need of any frasast. At the beginning of the Srōš Drōn, he has to gaze continously and carefully at the implements until the partaking of the drōn. He should keep the wars and the tools away from the barsom. He should put in place the hōm (at least three pieces) and the urwarām (one piece).."
